actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to designate June 24 of each year as "Puerto Rican Day".

summary.text: Designates June 24 of each year as "Puerto Rican Day", and authorizes the President to issue a proclamation calling for the observance of such day with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: A resolution to designate June 24 of each year as "Puerto Rican Day".
